name: Temples
description:
Hi There!

This is an Adventure/Puzzle-Game in which you can go from level to level. It is more like an experimental game in which you have to solve different puzzles of all kind, so there is not really a big story. The main goal is to reach the last level and finish it. Have fun playing! :)

Controls:
W: Forward
S: Backward
A: Left
D: Right
Shift: Sprint
Space: Jump

Left-click: Interact

I am excited to hear anything from you :)

... If you struggle at the start just look beneath the barrel in the water ;)
